data.title: Blackbaud Fundraiser Performance Management
data.text:
Find new supporters and untapped potential in your existing donor database with easy-to-use cultivation tools

Feel confident you’re taking the right actions with powerful analytics that automatically surface smart recommendations, such as top prospects, suggested ask amounts, donors at risk of lapsing, and more—all directly within in your fundraising software

Reach more prospects with data enrichment services that help you find missing addresses, emails, and phone numbers

Raise awareness for your mission and keep constituents engaged with beautiful, dynamic email campaigns

Deliver the right message at the right time through the right channel with integrated multichannel techniques and tools

Understand what motivates your contacts with clear reporting on how your campaigns perform

Maximize your programming with advanced tools and insightful metrics for events, volunteers, members, and diverse programming

Save time and money by consolidating disparate processes, communications, and data into one comprehensive cloud solution that’s accessible to your entire organization anywhere, anytime, and on any device

Make smarter, more efficient decisions with intuitive reporting and dashboards that track key nonprofit metrics, such as donor retention and acquisition

Fundraising software that automatically processes online donations, pledges, and payment through your website—no manual entry required

Bring your organization together with role-based work centers built specifically to help track individual and team performance, manage portfolios, and quickly view recent touch points

Gain a holistic view of your prospects, donors, and volunteers all in one place, so you can collaborate and share information seamlessly across your organization
